entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:59 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:59 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
